body: How is DaGoldBrick unbanned he has been banned on god knows how many accounts and he gets unbanned like what?
body_tagged: How is DaGoldBrick unbanned he has been banned on god knows how many accounts and he gets unbanned like what?
title: Please tell me how?

replies.body: ...appeal...
replies.body_tagged: ...appeal...

replies.body: How? He just joined with an alt and hacked yesterday like what then complained on the forums about it.

DaGoldBrick has like 800 alts and a bunch of proxies. Staff should just give up on trying to ban him :/

replies.body:
He hasn't done anything to bad on his alts.
The truth is he really didn't need to be banned on his main.
Hence, his alts remain banned (the alts he actually used) but his main is unbanned
